name: Veggie Kale Chips
author: Keri Ann
summary: A great way to eat your vegetables and actually enjoy them. A great alternative to potato chips, veggie chips/straws, or popcorn. Sherry or apple cider vinegar can be used in place of the vinegar if desired.
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves ripped into bite-size pieces
1 tablespoon olive oil, or more as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Place kale leaves in a large resealable bag
Mix olive oil and garlic together in a bowl; pour over kale
Seal and shake bag until kale leaves are evenly coated
Add vinegar to bag, reseal bag, and shake until coated
Spread leaves evenly onto a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until crisp, 20 to 25 minutes
